Assassin of Shadows

Izzabella Ruzziano has lived the life of a ruthless assassin. With an impossible contract in front of her that will grant her the thing that she wants most in life, she has to face some of the toughest decisions yet. Will she crumble? Or will she do what she does best and fake it till she makes it? Welcome to the world of Izzabella Ruzziano, a world that is as dark as night and as cruel as life. If she can survive it, can you?

Never Back Down

Born into a world of gangs and violence, Phoenix spends her last year of high school tracking down the person who is responsible for murdering her father. Little does she know, he's a lot closer than she thinks. "I was always a very intuitive kid, always picking up the little things. I knew, even at the age of five, that my dad didn't have a "normal job". "Normal jobs" didn't involve guns and body guards.
